column4: is there anyway to convert an ntfs filesystem to an ext2/ext3 filesystem without destroying all the current data on it?
is there anyway to convert an ntfs filesystem to an ext2/ext3 filesystem without destroying all the current data on it?
can you move the data to another partition then format as ext3 then move the data back. You can't convert ntfs>>ext* as far as I know.
no you will have to move your data then convert the partition to ext3 then move the data back. afaik
